title: Season 8
body:
so i just finished my provisionals and i got into silver 3. s8 is starting soon and i was wondering if when the season starts will my rank go down if i dont play any ranked games/get lp?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
during preseason you will still gain LP and rise/fall from your current rank. However it doesnt really mean that much.

When season 8 begins, you will start unranked and will need to do 10 placement matches again to get another rank.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=azu26qgA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-28T08:10:51.617+0000)
>
> during preseason you will still gain LP and rise/fall from your current rank. However it doesnt really mean that much.
> 
> When season 8 begins, you will start unranked and will need to do 10 placement matches again to get another rank.

Along with this, all your MMR from the last season will transfer over, but at a lower amount and providing you keep a steady performance, for example if you won 7/10 placements and ended s3, you might then go 6/10 next season and end up s5
